title: Similar font to Mobil?
content:
Hi, can anyone suggest a very similar font to this? Best guess I've had so far is Avant Gare Gothic in bold...  
Also, does anyone know if this actually is the corporate font of Mobil or whether it's just one of those knockoffs?

Many thanks!

/H
